title: 30day ban not ending
body: I've been banned for 30days. It's been over 40days and the account is still banned. They didn't even send me an email with the date the ban is supposed to end like they were supposed to everytime they ban someone.

replies.body:
Sounds like you got permabanned and their is a visual bug saying 30.>

I've never heard of a 30 day ban with the new punishment tiers

As *HYperiod3182* mentioned, it's best to reach out via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) since this is pertaining to your account status specifically.

Let me know if you have any questions.

http://imgur.com/a/jz8xp

I was using Korean Client and it said 30day ban so I waited patiently and it didn't end. In a curious gesture, I tried switching back to NA client. It says perma banned. I feel completely robbed since I spent 100s if not over 1000dollars on the account.
Riot support doesn't even answer for 4days now

We've been pretty slammed with tickets lately. An account specialist will get back to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hello, 30days ban don't exist, I strongly suggest you contact Player Support for more explanation.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
